TEXT.TITLE: CARMEL <KML> HOLDER SELLS SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Carmel Container Systems Ltd said Mikhal Industrial and Development Management Ltd sold 202,500 shares to a group of private investors. After the sale, Mikhal retains a 49 pct ownership of Carmel Plaro Holding Ltd, which owns 51 pct of Carmel Container SYstems' outstanding stock. Reuter
